name: Mapper Simulator
description:
Originally released on Scratch on May 11th, 2019, Mapper Simulator for its 1 year anniversary is getting released as a .exe for the first time! Now you can play the game without the lag of Scratch. Mapper Simulator simulates the life of a mapper, trying to beat the top mappers, and bans. You make projects to gain views and followers. Later on you can get Bucks, which are used to buy songs. On Scratch, Mapper Simulator has more then 250 views, and is one of the biggest games in SMC history! So download Mapper Simulator. This release contains the v.1.2 version of the game. 

In v.1.2, Dark mode and backgrounds are here!

v.1.3 will likely be the last update to Mapper Simulator, and will release on Scratch and here.
